root.name: Star Ocean: Blue Sphere
root.description: OverviewMobile Phone ArtworkStar Ocean: Blue Sphere is an action RPG developed by tri-Ace and published by Enix for the Gameboy Color in June 28, 2001. The game takes place two years after Star Ocean: The Second Story and follows the continuing adventures of the original cast. Enix originally intended on publishing Blue Sphere in North America but the plans were eventual canceled due to technical issues as well as the impending release of the Gameboy Advance. On June 8, 2009 a remake of Blue Sphere was released for mobile phones in Japan.
